description:
Attorneys who are also Physicians set the law firm of Leon Aussprung M.D. apart from other firms. From his main law office located in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, doctor-lawyer Leon Aussprung, M.D., Esq. provides unmatched advocacy and support to clients from the Philadelphia metro region and throughout Pennsylvania and New Jersey, who have suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one due to the negligence and wrongdoing of a physician, nurse or other health care provider.

Regarded as one of its region's premier medical malpractice law firms, the firm has an additional office in Cherry Hill, New Jersey. During their time in practice, the firm's attorneys have achieved remarkable success fighting for the rights and interests of clients adversely affected by doctor and hospital errors, surgical errors, birth injuries, failures to diagnose, and other preventable tragedies.

The firm's founder, attorney Leon Aussprung, is a board-certified physician as well as a lawyer. He has extensive experience handling both the medical and legal aspects of his clients' medical malpractice claims. Leading a team of some of the best and brightest minds in the profession, Mr. Aussprung and the other attorneys at the firm promise to do all they can to increase their clients' chances of obtaining the justice they deserve. As evidence of their success, they have recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for their plaintiff clients.

Along with medical malpractice, the firm's attorneys also handle all other types of personal injury and wrongful death claims, including those arising from

• Car and truck accidents
• Unsafe property conditions
• Sexual abuse
• Defective products
• Construction accidents and more

To find out how the law firm of Leon Aussprung can best assist you with your legal challenge, you can contact them by calling the office or visiting the website to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also offers virtual consultations so you do not have to further risk your health and safety to speak with them.
